overview: Would you transform your body for love? Andrea and Serena are in a tired phase, their relationship seems to be at a standstill. At a party, Lilly gives the coup-de-grace to the couple. When Serena decides to abandon him, Andrea is at a crossroads and takes note of the renewal the relationship needs to be recovered. There needs to be a complete, total reversal.
title: L'inversione dei poli
